Translations.Text: Qayamat ka ilm Allah hi ki taraf lotaya jata hai aur jo jo phal apnay shagoofon mein say nikaltay hain aur jo madah hamal say hoti hai aur jo bachay woh janti (peda kerti) hai sab ka ilm ussay hai aur jiss din Allah Taalaa inn (mushrikon) ko bula ker daryaft farmaye ga meray shareek kahan hain woh jawab den gay kay hum ney to tujhay keh sunaya kay hum mein say to koi iss ka gawah nahi
Aur yeh jin (jin) ki parashtish iss say pehlay kertay thay woh inn ki nigah say gum hogaye aur enhon ney samjh liya kay abb inn kay liye koi bachao nahi
Bhalaee kay mangney say insan thakta nahi aur agar issay koi takleef phonch jaye to mayyus aur na umeed hojata hai

Aur jo museebat ussay phonch chuki hai iss kay baad agar hum issay kissi rehmat ka maza chakhayen to woh keh uthta hai kay iss ka to mein haqdaar hi tha aur mein to khayal hi nahi ker sakta kay qayamat qaeem hogi aur agar mein apnay rab kay pass wapis kiya gaya to bhi yaqeenan meray liye uss kay pass bhi behtri hai yaqeenan hum inn kuffaar ko unkay aemaal say khabardaar keren gay aur unhen sakht azab ka maza chakhayen gay
Aur jab hum insan per apna inam kertay hain to woh mun pher leta hai aur kinara kash hojata hai aur jab ussay museebat parti hai to bari lambi chori duyen kerney wala bann jata hai

Aap keh dijiyey! Kay bhala yeh to batao kay agar yeh quran Allah ki taraf say aaya hua ho phir tum ney issay na mana pus uss say barh ker behka hua kon hoga jo mukhalifat mein (haq say) door chala jaye

Un-qareeb hum enhen apni nishaniyan aafaq-e-aalam mein bhi dikhayen gay aur khud inn ki apni zaat mein bhi yahan tak kay inn per khul jaye kay haq yehi hai kiya aap kay rab ka her cheez say waqif-o-aagah hona kafi nahi
Yaqeen jano! Kay yeh log apnay rab kay roobaroo janey say shak mein hain yaad rakho kay Allah Taalaa her cheez ka ehaata kiyey huyey hai

Allah Taalaa jo zabardast hai aur hikmat wala hai issi tarah teri taraf aur tujh say aglon ki taraf wahee bhejta raha
Aasmano ki (tamam) cheezen aur jo kuch zamin mein hai sab ussi ka hai woh bartar aur azeem-us-shan hai

Qareeb hai aasman uper say phat paren aur tamam farishtay apnay rab ki paki tareef kay sath biyan ker rahey hain aur zamin walon kay liye istaghfar ker rahey hain. Khoob samajh rakho kay Allah Taalaa hi maaf farmaney wala rehmat wala hai
Jinn logon ney uss kay siwa doosron ko kaar saaz bana liya hai Allah Taalaa unn per nigran hai aur aap unkay zimaydaar nahi hain

Issi tarah hum ney aap ki taraf arabi quran ki wahee ki hai takay aap makkah walon ko aur uss kay aas pass logon ko khabardar ker den aur jama honey kay din say jiss kay aanay mein koi shak nahi dara den. Aik giroh jannat mein hoga aur aik giroh jahannum mein hoga
Agar Allah Taalaa chahata to inn sab ko aik hi ummat ka bana deta lekin woh jissay chahata hai apni rehmat mein dakhil ker leta hai aur zalimon ka haami aur madadgar koi nahi
Kiya inn logon ney Allah kay siwa aur kaar saaz bana liye hain (haqeeqatan) to Allah Taalaa hi kaar saaz hai wohi murdon ko zindah keray ga aur wohi her cheez per qadir hai
Aur jiss jiss cheez mein tumhara ikhtilaf ho uss ka faisla Allah Taalaa hi ki taraf hai yehi Allah mera rab hai jiss per mein ney bharosa ker rakha hai aur jiss ki taraf mein jhukta hun

Woh aasmano aur zamin ka peda kerney wala hai uss ney tumhray liye tumhari jins kay joray bana diyey hain. Aur chopayon kay joray banaye hain tumhen woh iss mein phela raha hai uss jesi koi cheez nahi woh sunnay aur dekhney wala hai
Aasmano aur zamin ki kunjiyan ussi ki hain jiss ki chahye rozi kushada ker day aur tang ker day yaqeenan woh her cheez jannay wala hai
